agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Public Education TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Tuesday, April 9, 2019 PLACE: E2.036 CHAIR: Rep. Dan Huberty *The order in which bills are heard is at the discretion of the chair* *Testimony will be limited to two (2) minutes* HB 43 Hinojosa | et al. Relating to the admission policy of an open-enrollment charter school. HB 139 González, Mary Relating to the establishment of a new open-enrollment charter school or campus. HB 228 Krause Relating to accountability and standards for districts of innovation. HB 570 Capriglione Relating to certain meetings of open-enrollment charter schools. HB 636 White Relating to the disclosure of interested parties by business entities contracting with open-enrollment charter schools. HB 769 Davis, Sarah | et al. Relating to the termination of the contract of a superintendent of a school district based on malfeasance. HB 1003 Collier Relating to the composition of the student body of an open-enrollment charter school. HB 1301 Davis, Sarah Relating to the duties of the board of trustees of certain school districts. HB 1730 Davis, Yvonne Relating to the approval of the establishment or expansion of an open-enrollment charter school. HB 1853 Pacheco Relating to the applicability of educator certification requirements and certain educator rights to charter schools. HB 1981 Cole Relating to the establishment of a new open-enrollment charter school or campus. HB 2190 Hunter Relating to admission of certain students to an open-enrollment charter school in certain counties. HB 2406 Geren Relating to political advertising by open-enrollment charter schools. HB 2487 Dutton Relating to the applicability of certain laws to open-enrollment charter schools. HB 2488 Dutton Relating to requiring certain open-enrollment charter schools to comply with historically underutilized business provisions. HB 2510 Hinojosa | et al. Relating to the suspension and expulsion of a student attending an open-enrollment charter school. HB 2621 Bailes Relating to open-enrollment charter school admission procedures and reporting requirements for certain admission information. HB 2760 Allison Relating to the requirements for an application for or a request for the revision of a charter for an open-enrollment charter school. HB 2776 Allison Relating to requiring an open-enrollment charter school to prepare an informed choice report containing certain information about the school. HB 2824 VanDeaver Relating to the pilot program for assessing public school students in writing under an alternative method. HB 2964 Davis, Yvonne Relating to a prohibition placed on an open-enrollment charter school against the employment of a person determined under certain circumstances to have engaged in misconduct that presents a risk to the health, safety, or welfare of a student or minor. HB 2983 Huberty Relating to the administration to public school students in certain grades of state-administered assessment instruments. HB 2987 Ramos Relating to requiring the posting of certain information on an open-enrollment charter school's Internet website regarding the school's governing body. HB 2991 Talarico Relating to the use of disciplinary alternatives to suspension by a school district and the creation of the restorative justice coordinating council. HB 3012 Talarico | et al. Relating to requiring the provision of instruction to public school students subject to in-school or out-of-school suspension. HB 3013 Talarico | et al. Relating to the suspension or expulsion of a student by an open-enrollment charter school. HB 3069 González, Mary | et al. Relating to the establishment of a grant program for promoting computer science certification and professional development in coding, technology applications, and computer science for public school teachers. HB 3155 Deshotel Relating to the applicability of certain laws to open-enrollment charter schools. HB 3219 Allison Relating to the discipline and behavior management of a public school student. HB 3263 Allen Relating to the protection of an employee of an open-enrollment charter school who reports a violation of law. HB 3322 Burns Relating to requiring a school district to post on the district's Internet website the name and contact information of each school administrator primarily responsible for student discipline at a district campus. HB 3398 Johnson, Jarvis Relating to challenges by school districts and open-enrollment charter schools to accountability determinations. HB 3861 Bohac Relating to state funding and accountability provisions applicable to school district campuses and programs operated under school district and charter partnerships. HB 3877 Ramos Relating to the public accessibility of open-enrollment charter school annual financial statements. HB 3904 Huberty Relating to public school accountability, including certain assessment requirements, performance standards, and sanctions, including sanctions affecting educator contracts, and to providing alternative methods to satisfy certain public high school graduation requirements. HB 3941 Deshotel Relating to online adult high school diploma programs. HB 4209 Davis, Yvonne Relating to the election of members of the governing body of an open-enrollment charter school. HB 4242 Bernal | et al. Relating to the administration of state assessments. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
